item.title: Atma stutiH
item.description:
Source: TW

The shruti has various versions of “Atmastuti-s,” where the yajamAna speaks as indra, varuNa or himself has an experience encompassing divinity or an experience of macranthropic polytheism (e.g., “ahaM rudrebhiH …” = vAg Atmastuti). We see an Egyptian expression resembling that in Ani’s papyrus of the Book of the Dead. Could it be seen as a soteriological destination of the Egyptian (c.f. tropes found in the vAg-Atmastuti, anna-stuti of bhR^igu in the taittirIya shruti, etc.):

item.title: NyAsa
item.description:
In the shruti and late vaidika tradition, there are several a~nganyAsa-s, a theme which continues into the Agamika tradition. One example in the late vaidika tradition is the laghunyAsa of bodhAyana: prajanane brahmA tiShThatu | … ityAdi. We encounter a similar one in the papyrus of Nu from around 1400 BCE:

My hair is that of Nun,
my face is that of Aten,
my eyes are those of Hathor,
my ears are those of Wepwawet,
my nose is that of the Foremost of Khasu,
my lips are those of Anubis,
my teeth are those of Serqet,
my neck is that of Isis the goddess,
my arms are those of the Ba-soul lord of Djedet
my front is that of Neit lady of Sais,
my back is that of Seth,
my penis is that of Baba,
my flesh is that of the lords of Kheraba,
my chest is that of the god Great of Dignity,
my stomach and spine are those of Sekhmet,
my buttocks are those of the Eye of Horus,
my thighs and flanks are those of Nut,
my legs are those of Ptah,
my toes are those of living falcons.
[No limb] of mine is without a god.

item.title: Orion dead-passage
item.description:
Passage

Source: TW

The Orion region of the sky is indicated as the passage to the southern realm of the dead in an incantation from 950 BCE found in the Egyptian Book of the Dead:

My ba-soul* flies up beside Orion,
to take its place in the southern sky.
The protection of the Chant-goddess shelters it (= the ba-soul),
the Great Sow (=goddess Nut) shelters it, her arms behind you.
The fighters of faces defend you,
the soil over you is removed for you.
